title: SET_VEHICLE_KEEP_ENGINE_ON_WHEN_ABANDONED
content:
0xB8FBC8B1330CA9B40x51E0064F// SetVehicleKeepEngineOnWhenAbandoned
void SET_VEHICLE_KEEP_ENGINE_ON_WHEN_ABANDONED(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL toggle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.toggle: true to keep the engine on, otherwise false.Calling this native will keep a vehicle's engine running after exiting.Old name:  _SET_VEHICLE_JET_ENGINE_ON
